changeSet.author: thalabi
changeSet.createView: with latest_date as ( select max(date) date from exchange_rate where from_currency='USD' and to_currency='CAD' ), rate_on_latest_date as ( select rate from exchange_rate er join latest_date on er.date=latest_date.date and er.from_currency='USD' and er.to_currency='CAD' ), cad_and_usd_values as ( select p.position_snapshot, sum(p.quantity*p.price) value from position p join instrument i on p.instrument_id = i.id where i.currency = 'CAD' group by p.position_snapshot union all select p.position_snapshot, sum(p.quantity*p.price*(select rate from rate_on_latest_date)) value from position p join instrument i on p.instrument_id = i.id where i.currency = 'USD' group by p.position_snapshot ) select row_number() over (order by position_snapshot) id, position_snapshot, sum(value) market_value from cad_and_usd_values group by position_snapshot order by position_snapshot
